content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ View device hardware information in device asset profiles June 17, 2024—Device asset profiles in Attack Surface Discovery are now able to display discovered basic hardware specifications such as manufacturer, model, CPU, RAM, and disk size. Find discovered details under the basic category within the device asset profile. Cyber Risk Exposure Management → Attack Surface Discovery © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: View device hardware information in device asset profiles
